definition: a collection or mass, especially of something that cannot be counted
a group of objects of one type that have been collected by one person or in one place
a number of people or things that are put together or considered as a unit
(a sign or symbol representing) a unit that forms part of the system of counting and calculating
to write your name, usually on a written or printed document, to show that you agree with its contents or have written or created it yourself
belonging or relating to the person or group of people being spoken or written to
